SELECT dtls.mssageId , dtls.sndngResultCode , dtls.sndr , dtls.rcver , dtls.sj , dtls.sndngDe , dtls.atchFileId FROM ( SELECT mssage_id AS mssageId , (SELECT code_nm FROM TC_CMMNDETAILCODE WHERE use_at = 'Y' AND code_id = 'COM024' AND code = sndng_result_code) AS sndngResultCode , sndr AS sndr , rcver AS rcver , sj AS sj , dsptch_dt AS sndngDe , atch_file_id AS atchFileId FROM th_EMAILDSPTCHMANAGE WHERE 1=1

AND email_cn LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
